column4: Augmented Reality (AR), sometimes referred to as hybrid reality, Mixed Reality (MR) or blended reality is the merging of real and virtual worlds to produce new environments and visualizations where physical and digital objects co-exist and interact in real time.
column6: Gartner: Top 10 Strategic Technology Trends for 2017: Virtual Reality and Augmented Reality
column8: Helps cardiologists complete difficult coronary artery blockage surgery via assisted augmented displays.
